rv
======

[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/rv)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=rv)[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/jsta/rv.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/jsta/rv)

The `rv` package provides tools for working with simulation-based random variables.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `rv` from [Github](https://github.com/jsta/rv) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("jsta/rv")
```

## Examples

See [website](https://jsta.github.io/rv)
